title: Juvale 24 Pack Clear 2 Oz Square Shot Glasses for Birthday, Wedding, Bulk Set for Tequila, Whiskey, Vodka, Liqueurs
features: Clear Shot Glasses: Our 2 oz square shot glasses feature a heavy rim and base, the perfect option for serving mezcal, cordial, tequila, vodka, whiskey, and your favorite mixed liqueur concoctions
Perfect For: These tequila shot glasses are perfect for your next pool party, backyard get-together, and everyday use; stack each shot glass on top of one another for a fun display
High-Quality: Our 2 oz whiskey shot glasses each feature a heavy base and measure 2 x 2 x 2 inches
Easy To Clean: Reuse each double shot glass for multiple celebrations; simply rinse them once the party is over for simple and easy cleanup
Comes With: This bulk pack features 24 clear 2 oz glass shot glasses; perfect for your next family gathering or holiday party
description: Celebrate amongst friends and enjoy whiskey, vodka, or tequila shots with this bulk set of party shot glasses. Each glass has a heavy base and is perfect for indoor or outdoor festivities. Serve each guest a drink and get the party started. The square double shot glasses each hold up to 2 ounces and measure 2 x 2 x 2 inches. You will receive 24 whiskey shot glasses, perfect for housewarming gifts or bars and restaurants.
